content:
I think I'll go with a combination of congratulations, inspiration, and a personal touch. Here's what I have in mind:

"Dear Alex, Huge congratulations on your graduation! I'm beyond proud of you and all your accomplishments. This paperweight is a small token of my admiration for your hard work and dedication. As you start this new chapter in your career, remember that believing in yourself is half the battle. You've got this, Alex! I'm excited to see the amazing things you'll achieve. Love, [Your Name]"

I think this message captures my feelings and conveys my support and encouragement for Alex's future endeavors. Thanks for the help!
